subject: Re: About: Re: [EVP-ITC]Re: insulted by the spirits

full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_001C_01C95062.1DC6E180

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

LOL please forgive my typos I read this again after I sent it. I seem to be=
 very adept at typos-rolls my eyes!
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From:=
 Andrea Carr 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, November 27,=
 2008 7:25 AM
  Subject: Re: About: Re: [EVP-ITC]Re: insulted by the spirit=
s



  That could be a possibilty but also remember if you were an a-hole i=
n life it's not going to change because you pass over. I had a haunting in =
NH where this was very much the case.

  Also there are variables like enti=
ties from the lower planes that can come through when recording, vortex's t=
hat might allow opportunities to go from the other side to here, alien cont=
act or maybe simple interfences.

  I think sometis it maybe one who tries =
to intimidate us while recording. 

  I am also  Clairaudient  and here the=
 spirits that are stronger talk out loud.

  I do believe there is a mix of=
 good and evil of course in the spirit realm and some are pranksters. I oft=
en delete or not share the negative EVP'S unless it seems to be relevant to=
 the current work at hand.

  I have always beleived that perception can al=
so play into how we hear an EVP. 

  I have had the clearest EVP'S and have=
 had several people listen to them to only find out that almost every perso=
n heard it differently. Factors being computer, speakers, and your audio so=
ftware.


  Just some thoughts.

  Hope everyone ahs a nice Thanksgiving!

=
  Andrea
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Clara Febach 
    To: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, November 27, 2008 2:08 AM
    =
Subject: About: Re: [EVP-ITC]Re: insulted by the spirits


          I have=
 no real advice to add to this topic: but a thought that came to me while r=
eading your messages.

          What if there is 'crime' in the ethereal a=
s well as our physical world (from the good vs evil idea) ... and maybe an =
energy can possess or draw from another less powerful energy and 'change' i=
t?

          What do you think?

          --- On Wed, 11/26/08, black bea=
r hollow <blackbearhollow@...> wrote:

            From: black bear h=
ollow <blackbearhollow@...>
            Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: in=
sulted by the spirits
            To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
            D=
ate: Wednesday, November 26, 2008, 4:08 PM


            If you are hearing=
 spirits, that's not EVP, but Clairaudience. Another thing to note is she m=
ay or may not have been talking to you at all. They talk amongst themselves=
 a lot more than to us. She was probably not even talking to you. I'm not s=
ure why people always assume energies are always talking to them or label t=
hem "evil" because of the sound of the voice they are modulating. That's a =
great error in my opinion. A really nice energy might sound like a stereoty=
pical Hollywood "demon". To stereotype energies, to me, is just silly. 



=
            w.

            On Nov 26, 2008, at 6:35 PM, neli neilim wrote:=



              Al,

              That's impossible cause I do EVP with o=
thers that are great, it seems that that woman changed her bad humor lately=
, cause now is like if wanting to apologize, or to be kind, but I don't tru=
st her. It seems that someone else took control on her and put her off or m=
aybe was reprimanded by another spirit, cause sometimes I can hear some of =
them talking between them, chatting as we do.

              Neli



      =
